#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
  int t,fac[12];
  fac[0] = 1;
  fac[1] = 1;
  fac[2] = 2;
  fac[3] = 6;
  fac[4] = 24;
  fac[5] = 120;
  fac[6] = 720;
  fac[7] = 5040;
  fac[8] = 40320;
  fac[9] = 362880;
  fac[10] = 3628800;
  fac[11] = 39916800;

  scanf("%d",&t);
  while(t--)
  { int k,score[11],i,count1= 0,count2= 0;
    long long int num;
    for(i=0;i<11;i++)
      scanf("%d",&score[i]);
    scanf("%d",&k);
    sort(score,score+11);
    int fixed = score[11-k];
    for(i=12-k;i<11;i++)
    { if(score[i] == fixed)
       count1++;
      else
        break;
    }
    for(i=10-k;i>=0;i--)
    { if(score[i] == fixed)
       count2++;
      else
        break;
    }
    num = (fac[count1+count2+1])/(fac[count2]*fac[count1+1]);
    printf("%lld\n",num);
  }
  return 0;
}
